events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it does not fit me well. I would like to return the item and request a refund.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to customer wanting to return a purchased jacket.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket has only been tried on but is still in perfect condition with tags attached.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket to our address within 14 days for a full refund. We will provide a prepaid return label shortly.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate the prepaid label and quick assistance with the refund.
We have sent the prepaid return label to your email. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed promptly.
Just following up to confirm that you received the prepaid label and that you have shipped the jacket back for refund processing.
Yes, I shipped the jacket yesterday using the return label. Please let me know when the refund is processed.
We have received your returned jacket in good condition and your refund has been processed. You should see it in your account shortly.
Thank you for contacting us. Your refund case has been closed. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
